version_description:
2.0.5:
- Quick fix for iPad when opening in landscape orientation

2.0.4:
- Quick fix for the new iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
- High quality when sharing directly to Instagram

Stay tuned for coming updates! Thanks for your support! Remember to follow us on Instagram @wordswag for creative tips and inspiration!

You asked for it, you got it -- SO MANY more creative possibilities!
- TWELVE new hand-designed font styles!!
- Gold foil text!!
- Stamped text!!
- Watercolor text!!
- 108 new backgrounds (plus 590,000 from Pixabay!)
- 16 new image filters!
- New quotes!
- Lots of bug fixes and tweaks :)
I hope you love this latest update! Follow us @wordswag on Instagram for ideas and inspiration!

2.1.1: Quick tweaks & bug fixes!
==
2.1: You asked for it, you got it -- SO MANY more creative possibilities!
- TWELVE new hand-designed font styles!!
- Gold foil text!!
- Stamped text!!
- Watercolor text!!
- 108 new backgrounds (plus 590,000 from Pixabay!)
- 16 new image filters!
- New quotes!
- Lots of bug fixes and tweaks :)
I hope you love this latest update! Follow us @wordswag on Instagram for ideas and inspiration!

2.1.5: Crop options & minor tweaks
More updates coming soon! In the meantime enjoy this update :)
- Crop options: Perfectly sized for Facebook, Twitter, and more
- Custom text colors w/ the new hex code input (go to the color picker and tap on the "#")
- Choose JPEG or PNG output: Save space or get maximum quality
- Startup sound on/off option (finally!)
- Font tweaks & refinements
- Refreshed backgrounds
- Refined UI
I hope you enjoy this latest update! Follow us @wordswag on Instagram for ideas and inspiration!

Optimized for iPhone X - Multiple Layers - New Styles & More!

- Now optimized for iPhone X
- Add and delete multiple text layers without having to save!
- 5 New Font Styles with more arriving every Monday!
- New Rose Gold, Copper & Silver colors!
- New crop sizes for social media!
- Bug fixes

Keep an eye out for new font styles released Mondays! Follow us on Instagram @wordswag to find out when new font styles drop :)

Hope you enjoy this version and thanks for all the feedback!

Diagonal text fix - Optimized for iPhone X - Multiple layers - New styles & more!

- Now optimized for iPhone X
- Add and delete multiple text layers without having to save! Just tap the "+" button at the top of the screen to add a text layer.
- 5 New Font Styles with more arriving every Monday!
- New Rose Gold, Copper & Silver colors!
- New crop sizes for social media!
- Bug fixes

Keep an eye out for new font styles released Mondays! Follow us on Instagram @wordswag to find out when new font styles drop :)

Hope you enjoy this version and thanks for all the feedback!

2.2.2: Clear background fix
2.2: Optimized for iPhone X - Multiple layers - New styles & more!
- Now optimized for iPhone X
- Add and delete multiple text layers without having to save! Just tap the "+" button at the top of the screen to add a text layer.
- 5 New Font Styles with more arriving every Monday!
- New Rose Gold, Copper & Silver colors!
- New crop sizes for social media!
- Bug fixes

Keep an eye out for new font styles released Mondays! Follow us on Instagram @wordswag to find out when new font styles drop :)

Hope you enjoy this version and thanks for all the feedback!

- Bug fixes
- Keep an eye out for fresh new font styles every week! Follow us on Instagram @wordswag to find out when new font styles drop :)

- Bug fixes

- Added Unsplash photo search! Beautiful images, absolutely free.
- "Add Text" now duplicates the current text style (as some of you requested!)
- Your last used font style will now show up first when you the app :)

And recently we added:
- 11 fresh new font styles!
- Exclusive hand-painted backgrounds!
- New backgrounds, UI refinements and more...

Thanks for your ongoing support :)
Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for tutorials, inspiration and more!
Feedback? Email us at feedback@wordswag.co

New Duotone filters give your designs a fresh look! Find them under the image tab.

Also - other image filters have been refined to look better than ever.

Thanks for your ongoing support. More updates are coming soon!
Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for tutorials, inspiration and more!
Feedback? Email us at feedback@wordswag.co

- Bug fixes
- Keep an eye out for fresh new font styles every week! Follow us on Instagram @wordswag to find out when new font styles drop :)

- Fixed transparency
- Make your text smaller
- Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for inspiration and tutorials! :)

Perfectly center your text! When your text is close to center it will automatically snap into place.

Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for tutorials, inspiration and more!

Feedback? Email us at feedback@wordswag.co - thanks!

Scrubbed and polished Word Swag to work better than ever. Plus a fresh new app icon!

- Updated interface
- Faster photo library access
- Updated logo and icon

More updates coming soon!

Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for tutorials, inspiration and more!

Feedback? Email us at feedback@wordswag.co. Thanks!

Word Swag is now free to download! Old users automatically get upgraded to Pro status!
Also new:
- Super high res export (find it under ‘More’)
- New font styles!
- Fresh new text colors
- Optimized for the XS, XS Max and XR iPhones
Thanks for your ongoing support. More features are coming!
Follow us on Instagram @wordswag for tutorials, inspiration and more!
Feedback? Email us at feedback@wordswag.co

(We fixed a bug yesterday where some of you weren't automatically upgraded. Sorry about that! Please restart the app if you had that issue.)
